about_the_game:
A circus troupe comes to Yomogi Town, a rural town in Japan situated between mountains and the ocean. As the son of the circus ringmaster, enjoy a special summer filled with wholesome adventures!

All of Yomogi Town and the nature surrounding it are an open world where you can enjoy your days to the fullest. Immerse yourself in nostalgic scenery filled with towering clouds, beautiful sunsets, and the sound of cicadas.

You can chill in the shopping district, listen to live music in the afternoon, or go on a wild and exciting adventure. It's all up to you.

Feel like climbing up a tall, steep cliff? Or hopping from one rooftop to the next? Maybe look for a hidden gem at a remote spot? No problem! Even if you drop from a very high place, you'll be perfectly fine because you're the protagonist of this game.

You can spend time in an open field, quietly admiring the little flowers. Use the Acorn Shooter to catch bugs that are out of reach! Go fishing at a river or the sea! Donate rare bugs and fish to the museum for their exhibits! Have the fish you caught cooked into a delicious dish! Join the local detective agency, raise a wild pig, dig up fossils, ride a train, earn money, and write and draw in your picture diary!

During the summer festival, fireworks and the Bon Festival dance liven up the night. You can even help run the Fireworks Show! And you'll be directing the performance of the circus troupe in the latter half of your summer vacation. What a huge responsibility! Are you up for it?

Make your own, unforgettable memories during your summer vacation filled with unique experiences!

This is the latest work by Kaz Ayabe, creator of several games themed around summer vacation and childhood nostalgia. Natsu-Mon: 20th Century Summer Kid comes to Steam.

About the Gameplay:
Dive into a midsummer adventure in a vast open world!
Experience the freedom and nostalgia of a small country town brought to life in stunning 3D. Our game offers a seamless open-world environment where you can explore without any interruptions or loading screens.
  • Immersive Realism: Relive the magic of childhood adventures with lifelike 3D recreations of quaint shopping districts and charming single-car trains.
  • Dynamic Environment: Witness the passage of time and changing weather conditions in real-time, adding depth and authenticity to your journey.
  • Endless Exploration: Catch bugs, play detective, climb tall cliffs, even fly through the sky...
Reconnect with the childhood joys of exploration, embark on adventures you dreamed about back then, and create new memories in a world brimming with possibilities.

Notice

8/6/2024 update added English to the game language.

name: Natsu-Mon: 20th Century Summer Kid

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225/AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750/Radeon R7 360
  • Storage: 2.6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K/AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 Super/Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • Storage: 2.6 GB available space

short_description: A circus troupe comes to Yomogi Town, a rural town in Japan situated between mountains and the ocean. As the son of the circus ringmaster, enjoy a special summer filled with wholesome adventures!
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, English
*languages with full audio support
